name: Drone Collector (Luexks)
description:
I was sad that drones weren't as impactful as I wanted them to be in Risk of Rain 2. I loved drones. I made Drone Collector so that I could collect as many drones as I wanted to.

ROGUELIKE

Drone Collector is a roguelike. You die and then you come back.

KILL ENEMIES

All enemies are red because they are evil. Kill them to earn Euros. Many people ask why the enemies have Euros: it is because they are European, as Drone Collector takes place in Europe. 

OPEN CHESTS

You can open chests with for Euros. They have items in them that you can combine at a Prism.

REPAIR DRONES

The drones are broken and on the ground! Repair them with Euros! They will always help, you with the bullets!
